Configure Python / reticulate for soilVAE

Configure Python / reticulate for soilVAE

Usage

vae_configure(python = NULL, venv = NULL, conda = NULL)

vae_configure(python = NULL, venv = NULL, conda = NULL)

vae_configure(python = NULL, venv = NULL, conda = NULL)

Arguments

python

Path to python executable (optional).

venv

Name of virtualenv to use (optional).

conda

Name of conda env to use (optional).

Value

TRUE invisibly.
